addToWhitelist(address).details: Adds an address to whitelist maintained in the contract

params._of: is the address to burn tokens of

burnFrom(address,uint256).return: the boolean status of the burning process

burnLockedTokens(address,bytes32,uint256.details: Burns locked tokens of a user

params._of: address whose tokens are to be burned
params._reason: lock reason for which tokens are to be burned

params._newOperator: is the new address of operator

extendLock(bytes32,uint256).details: Extends lock for reason CLA for a specified time

params._reason: The reason to lock tokens, currently restricted to CLA

extendLockOf(address,bytes32,uint256).details: Extends lock for a specified reason and time

getLockedTokensValidity(address,bytes32).details: Gets the validity of locked tokens of a specified address

params._of: The address to query the validity
params.reason: reason for which tokens were locked

getUnlockableTokens(address).details: Gets the unlockable tokens of a specified address

params._of: The address to query the the unlockable token count of

increaseLockAmount(bytes32,uint256).details: Increase number of tokens locked for a CLA reason

params._amount: Number of tokens to be increased
params._reason: The reason to lock tokens, currently restricted to CLA

lock(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: Locks a specified amount of tokens,   for CLA reason and for a specified time

params._amount: Number of tokens to be locked
params._reason: The reason to lock tokens, currently restricted to CLA

lockOf(address,bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: Locks a specified amount of tokens against an address,   for a specified reason and time

params._amount: Number of tokens to be locked
params._of: address whose tokens are to be locked

mint(address,uint256).details: Mints new token for an address

params._member: address to reward the minted tokens

operatorTransfer(address,address,uint256.details: Proxies token transfer through this contract to allow staking when members are locked for voting

reduceLock(address,bytes32,uint256).details: reduce lock duration for a specified reason and time

params._of: The address whose tokens are locked

releaseLockedTokens(address,bytes32,uint.details: Released locked tokens of an address locked for a specific reason

params._of: address whose tokens are to be released from lock

removeFromWhitelist(address).details: Removes an address from the whitelist in the token

tokensLocked(address,bytes32).details: Returns tokens locked for a specified address for a   specified reason

params._of: The address whose tokens are locked
params._reason: The reason to query the lock tokens for

tokensLockedAtTime(address,bytes32,uint2.details: Returns tokens locked for a specified address for a   specified reason at a specific time

params._of: The address whose tokens are locked
params._reason: The reason to query the lock tokens for
params._time: The timestamp to query the lock tokens for

tokensUnlockable(address,bytes32).details: Returns unlockable tokens for a specified address for a specified reason

params._of: The address to query the the unlockable token count of
params._reason: The reason to query the unlockable tokens for

totalBalanceOf(address).details: Returns the total amount of tokens held by an address:  transferable + locked + staked for pooled staking - pending burns.  Used by Claims and Governance in member voting to calculate the user's vote weight.

params._of: The address to query the total balance of

totalLockedBalance(address,uint256).details: Returns the total locked tokens at time  Returns the total amount of locked and staked tokens at a given time. Used by MemberRoles to check eligibility  for withdraw / switch membership. Includes tokens locked for Claim Assessment and staked for Risk Assessment.  Does not take into account pending burns.

params._of: member whose locked tokens are to be calculate
params._time: timestamp when the tokens should be locked

unlock(address).details: Unlocks the unlockable tokens against CLA of a specified address

params._of: Address of user, claiming back unlockable tokens against CLA

updateUintParameters(bytes8,uint256).details: Updates Uint Parameters of a code

params.code: whose details we want to update
